Posts.EditableText:
Hi all

New user with what's hopefully a straightfoward question: is it possible to assign multiple authors to a game or story, so that my friend and I can log into our separate accounts and edit the same piece of work? Or do we need a shared account in order to collaborate? I've had a look through Tutorial and FAQ pages but didn't find anything on this topic.

Many thanks

Jess
Posts.HTML:
Hi all

New user with what's hopefully a straightfoward question: is it possible to assign multiple authors to a game or story, so that my friend and I can log into our separate accounts and edit the same piece of work? Or do we need a shared account in order to collaborate? I've had a look through Tutorial and FAQ pages but didn't find anything on this topic.

Many thanks

Jess

Posts.EditableText: You could simple share the .aslx file over email, google docs, Dropbox or some similar program.  I would not suggest trying to do it through the web version as it has its own issues.
Posts.HTML: You could simple share the .aslx file over email, google docs, Dropbox or some similar program.  I would not suggest trying to do it through the web version as it has its own issues.
